verbose_text: The LANA protein, expressed during viral latency, competes with IRF3 for binding to the IFN-beta promoter, thus preventing the expression of the CREB binding protein as well as inhibiting IFN-beta transcription.
evidence: LANA protein, expressed during viral latency, competes with IRF3 for binding to the IFN-beta promoter, thus preventing the expression of the CREB-binding protein as well as inhibiting IFN-beta transcription
